alert.note: Alert for Barber; Comanche; Edwards; Kiowa; Pawnee; Pratt; Stafford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 12 at 10:43PM CST by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Kiowa, northwestern Barber, northeastern Comanche, southeastern Pawnee, southwestern Stafford, southeastern Edwards and western Pratt Counties through 1115 PM CST... At 1043 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Centerview to near Greensburg to near Coldwater. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Fellsburg and Centerview around 1050 PM CST. Haviland around 1055 PM CST. Belpre around 1100 PM CST. Other locations in the path of these storms include Belvidere, Trousdale, Macksville, Hopewell, Croft, Cullison, Byers, Wellsford and Dillwyn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for south central Kansas.

area.areaDesc: Barber; Comanche; Edwards; Kiowa; Pawnee; Pratt; Stafford
